challenge.title: Step 7
challenge.description: Inside the print_expenses function, create a for loop that iterates over each item in the expenses list. Use expense as the loop variable and move pass inside the loop body.

tests.text: You should create a for loop that iterates over expenses in your print_expenses function. Remember to use pass within the loop body.
You should use expense as the loop variable.
You should have pass only inside your loop body.
